dt: {bc}a member of a group of people formerly considered to constitute a race {dx_def}see {dxt|race:1||1a}{/dx_def} of humans having African ancestry and classified according to physical traits (such as dark skin pigmentation)

et: Spanish or Portuguese, from {it}negro{/it} black, from Latin {it}nigr-, niger{/it}
shortdef: a person of Black African ancestry
a member of a group of people formerly considered to constitute a race of humans having African ancestry and classified according to physical traits (such as dark skin pigmentation)
